title: What Font is this?
content:
Hey there,  
anyone know what font this is? Its the Mumm Champagne logo.  
 ![Mumm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020212829im_/http:/www.worn-to-be-wild.com/font_id/mumm2.jpg)

Or does anyone know what font this is?  
 ![Champagner](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020212829im_/http:/www.worn-to-be-wild.com/font_id/maison.jpg)

Thanks for your help!
author: Boston_George

comments.content: Most probably a custom job for MUMM. And for what it's worth, reminds me of somehow [Sackers Antique Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020212829/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/SACKERS+ANTIQUE+ROMAN/fonts/) though.
